title: Bug 114470 [Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: Upon using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in the table filter, an error message is being displayed.
EB: No error message should be thrown when using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in the table filter.
SR: Steps to Reproduce:  1. Open the table filter. 2. Enter the value new Date('3/2/2005'). 3. Observe the error message that is displayed.
